title: Facebook’s ties with techUK in doubt over link to Government
text:
Britain’s leading lobby group for technology companies, techUK, is facing a potential funding squeeze amid questions over whether one of its biggest industry partners is considering severing ties.

The Sunday Telegraph understands that some executives at Facebook, the US social media giant, have been weighing up the company’s future relationship with techUK, as part of a debate over the group’s close links with the Government and its willingness to represent the interests of big Silicon Valley firms.

Facebook is one of techUK’s largest members alongside Google, Apple and Amazon, but the organisation represents more than 800 other companies. Membership fees are calculated based on revenue and the...
description: Britain’s leading lobby group for technology companies, techUK, is facing a potential funding squeeze amid questions over whether one of its biggest industry partners is considering severing ties.
